rfc.title: Structure in C for the Radar Parameter Block
rfc.author: R.J.Barnes

summary.p: A description of the data structure in the C language used to store the Radar Parameter Block.

body.p: The Radar Parameter block is used throughout SuperDARN software to store the radar operating parameters. Listed below is the C data structure struct RadarParm used to store the block.
The array limits are defined as macros in the header superdarn/limit.h.

td.pre: #define ORIGIN_TIME_SIZE 26 #define ORIGIN_COMMAND_SIZE 128 #define PULSE_SIZE 64 #define LAG_SIZE 96 #define MAX_RANGE 300 #define COMBF_SIZE 80 #define MAX_BEAM 255

body.p: The parameter data block structure is defined in the header superdarn/rprm.h.
